resources.string:
\t\t\t\t Within the application you can use the following features:\n
\n
• real time traffic signs detection and recognition using the device\'s camera;\n
• choice of an image from the storage space of the device to detect and recognize traffic signs.\n
\n
\t\t\t\t Project realized for the diploma thesis. Polytechnic University of Bucharest • Faculty of Electronics, Telecommunications and Information Technology • year 2022.
